column2: summ_funs <- summ(funs, caption = 'Summary of Plotting Functions')

Summary of Plotting Functions
Function Input Description Example
hist(x) vector Histogram hist(mtcars\$mpg)
plot(density(x)) density Density plot plot(density(rnorm(100)))
plot(y ~ x) formula (of vectors) Scatter plot with(mtcars, plot(mpg ~ wt))
plot(y ~ x, type = 'l') formula (of vectors) Line plot with(Orange, plot(circumference ~ age, type = 'l'))
boxplot(y ~ x) formula (of vectors) Box plot with(mtcars, boxplot(mpg ~ wt))
barplot(x) vector OR table Bar plot barplot(table(mtcars\$gear))
